Name: Vivez Versailles
About the game: Experience Versailles in virtual reality « Experience Versailles » invites you to live two historical events that took place at the Palace of Versailles. Enjoy an immersion in Louis XIV’s century and follow step by step the Siamese ambassadors came to meet the Sun King. Stroll through the Palace of Versailles by night and take part to the famous masked ball organized by Louis XV for his son. Relive the Palace of Versailles through the centuries, discover original historical reconstructions, and interact with the courtiers !
